data.title: New control system teaches soft robots the art of staying safe
data.description: System developed by researchers at MIT CSAIL and LIDS uses rigorous mathematics to ensure robots flex, adapt, and interact with people and objects in a safe and precise way. It helps robots remain flexible and responsive while mathematically guaranteeing they won’t exceed safe force limits.
